page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content:
SCHOOLING IN STAMFORD
The state primary schools are: Bluecoat County Primary, Malcolm sargent C.P., St Georges C of E, St Gilberts C of E, St Augustines R.C. The state Secondary moderns are: Fane, Exeter. The independent schools are Stamford School, Stamford High School and Priory College. At present all the junior schools have 11 plus exams from which 90 children from the local area are selected to take up county bought places at the two endowned schools, Stamford School and Stamford High School. Falling rolls in the area have meant that there are no longer enough children to fill the two secondary modern schools. A task force has been set up to resolve this problem
